text:
We have a scenario where we are running 3 JMETER (server) injecters on the same machine and controlling them from a remote controller.
We need to distinguish results from the 3 injecters.

I have implemented a new save service property to add this information, here is how it works:
1) add in jmeter.properties or user.properties : jmeter.save.saveservice.instanceid=true
2) Add to jmeter a property called JMETER_INSTANCE_ID : -JJMETER_INSTANCE_ID=JVM1

This will make results have a new value which will appear:
- after hostname in CSV case
- In attribute ii in XML case


I will submit a patch for this.
Hope you can take this into account.
Regards
Philippe
